title: Arsenal Font
content:
Please help me ID this font. I know it is an actual font i have found numerous logos floating on the net with this font.  
Thank you guys!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [gun\_\_1380649402\_Atlanta\_Gooners\_banner\_2013.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024924/http:/typophile.com/files/gun__1380649402_Atlanta_Gooners_banner_2013.jpg) | 82.57 KB |
| [Everything\_Arsenal\_final\_edit.jpg.0x675.yru72gx9kzc9pb9zzoeieggj64dkj4i.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024924/http:/typophile.com/files/Everything_Arsenal_final_edit.jpg.0x675.yru72gx9kzc9pb9zzoeieggj64dkj4i.jpg) | 84.38 KB |
author: freeman310

comments.content:
If there is a font exactly like this, I don't recall seeing it.  
The lettering is an adaptation of a classic blackletter style called textura. The font with the closest basic letter-forms is Fette Gotish

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FetteGotischAsArsenal_5474.gif)
  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fette-gotisch/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024924/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fette-gotisch/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fette-gotisch/")  
See also fonts like Unger Fraktur Fett 
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/UngerFrakturFettAsArsenel_5707.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/rmu/unger-fraktur/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024924/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/rmu/unger-fraktur/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/rmu/unger-fraktur/")  
and, particularly for the \_s\_, Fette Fraktur  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/FetteFrakturasArsenal_6004.gif)
  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fette-fraktur/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141008024924/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fette-fraktur/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/fette-fraktur/")  
Don
Very well, thnx for the feedback. I will see what I can do with these. Thank you
